channel.title: Adding perfect pickup? [Ground]
channel.description: [b][i][u]Hey I'm working on a server and I'm having trouble fixing the pick-up error.[/u][/i][/b] [i]Well, when I kill a rat and he drops a few coins I attempt to pick it up, while I'm standing on it, I pick it up first click. BUT, if I click it from a distance it makes me walk over to the item and yes I do want that, but what's wrong is, when I walk over onto the item I have to click it another time to pick the item up![/i] [i]So basically all I want is help to make it so when I click it from a distance I don't have to click it twice to pick up the item. I have tried to fix it, I have asked friends to help me, I have searched on the forums, I have even searched using other search-engines.[/i]

I fixed it though don’t worry

item.title: Adding perfect pickup? [Ground]
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

Edit: This is my packet, and my scan:

case 236: //pickup item int itemY = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); int itemID = inStream.readUnsignedWord(); int itemX = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); apickupid = itemID; apickupx = itemX; apickupy = itemY; break;

public void scanPickup() { if (absX == apickupx && absY == apickupy) { if (ItemHandler.itemExists(apickupid, absX, absY)) { int itemAmount = ItemHandler.itemAmount(apickupid, apickupx, apickupy); if (addItem(apickupid, itemAmount)) {//only removes the item when has enough space! ItemHandler.removeItem(apickupid, apickupx, apickupy, itemAmount); removeGroundItem(apickupx, apickupy, apickupid); apickupid = -1; apickupx = -1; apickupy = -1; } } else if (hasntLoggedin){ sendMessage("Too late, its gone!"); apickupid = -1; apickupx = -1; apickupy = -1; } } }

Don’t know if that’s much help either, but it’s all I found as of right now :S

Read full topic

item.title: Adding perfect pickup? [Ground]
item.dc:creator: @Girona Girona
item.description:
@Girona wrote:

Hey I’m working on a server and I’m having trouble fixing the pick-up error.
Well, when I kill a rat and he drops a few coins I attempt to pick it up, while I’m standing on it, I pick it up first click.
BUT, if I click it from a distance it makes me walk over to the item and yes I do want that, but what’s wrong is, when I walk over onto the item I have to click it another time to pick the item up!
So basically all I want is help to make it so when I click it from a distance I don’t have to click it twice to pick up the item. I have tried to fix it, I have asked friends to help me, I have searched on the forums, I have even searched using other search-engines.

Read full topic
